reviewText:
This video is only 15 minutes long, and that makes its priceing too high. It does show the evils of war, and the many inocents who always pay the price for it. It is a collection of films that were compiled to show the horrors of communist aggression. But it is done in the form of propaganda, and is one sided in its view points.
A side from all the above, it would be a good teaching tool for history, and why we sould avoid war to settle differences.
